content: round 1 ch1 not a st from now on single_crochet into each st around join the last st to the first with a slip_stitch 48sts rnds 2 & 3 ch1 single_crochet into each st around join 48sts fasten_off and hide loose ends flower make 1 round 1 magic_ring and work *ch2 2dc ch2 slip_stitch into the magic_ring repeat from * around making 4 petals in total close magic_ring fasten_off and hide loose ends using a small length of a complimentary coloured yarn and your darning needle attach the flower to the front of the headband working the stitches through the centre of the flower and between the petals as pictured above ~ ~ to find all of the clothing patterns for nelly containing over 70 individual clothing items not even including hair caps click here ~ ~ i hope you have enjoyed completing this pattern be sure to share your nelly dolls with us on the weebee appreciation society facebook page link on first page and to add your project to ravelry ~ ~
